alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson and west central Johnson Counties through 730 PM EST... At 700 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Nicklesville, or 9 miles south of Irwinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Chappells Mill and Nicklesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
